thread.title: Miley Cyrus wears the Star of David and a blue thong leotard for James Franco's bar mitzvah - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus wears the Star of David and a blue thong leotard for James Franco's bar mitzvah - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Miley Cyrus wears the Star of David and a blue thong leotard for James Franco's bar mitzvah - Showbiz
text: Miley Cyrus sure knows how to make an impression.The singer showed up at James Franco's bar mitzvah in a blue thong leotard, wearing the Star of David. © Action Press/REX Shutterstock Cyrus performed hits of her own and karaoke efforts like 'Superfreak' at the event, presented by Funny or Die and go90.And if the Star of David wasn't enough, Cyrus also showed up in a flower. As you do. © JB Lacroix/WireImage The event, for Seth Rogen's charity Hilarity for Charity, was a non-traditional celebration for the 37-year-old Franco.Rogen's wife Lauren Miller Rogen, Haim and Bill Hader were also in attendance. © Getty Images / Randy Shropshire/Hilarity for Charity Rogen's annual Alzheimer's disease fundraiser was live streamed on Saturday (October 17).
